verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let it rain, let it rain.
Open the flood gates of Heaven.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I feel The rain of your Love,
I feel The wind of your Spirit .
And now the heartbeat of heaven,
Let us hear

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Take me into your throne room
Let me see Your beauty, let me see Your face
